Soldiers in military police club room
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Interior view of a group of men sitting a tables, one man is at a jukebox
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Beer; Military exchanges; Military police; Military uniforms; Soldiers
Campbell, Morgan; Eyberse, William; Fiands, William J.; McCormack, Joe; Millsap, Elijah; Reeves, John W.; Sims, Robert R.; Sweeney, Edward
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article on November 14, 1946. " Front table, left to right, S/Sgt. William J. Fiands, Sgt. Robert R. Sims, and Corp. Elijah Millsap. Second table, left to right, Sgt. Morgan Campbell, Corp. John W. Reeves. Back table, left to right, First Sgt. William Eyberse, Corp. Joe McCormack and Sgt. Edward Sweeney."
